author: Sandy Blucker

review: Love love love it! Easy to connect to wifi and simple to use. Turned our TV into a smart tv.
author: Katherine A Bolus

review: between my Prime account and my Netflix account the firestick does a great job of having a single point of control.  I can stop using my Wii for TV.I can also easily move the firestick from one TV to another. This is especially helpful when I'm in my camper and TV reception is poor. I just fire up my wireless access point and plug in the firestick.  Game on!
author: Stephen Chott

review: I am very dissatisfied with my purchase of the fire stick.  In order to view the Netflix movies that I want, I have to pay over $20 a month.  And even then I can't get the more recent movies.  If I go back to having my Netflix CD's mailed, it will cost me less and I can watch the movies I want.  My dissatisfaction has made me hesitate to view the other programs on the fire stick.
author: Tina

review: This is a very useful device. I purchased 2 and will buy more as soon as I have time to configure the additional devices. There are so many things that can be done if you have the time to configure it properly!! Several YouTube video tutorials will assist in setting this to do a variety of things.
author: Kevin Phillips

review: I have enjoyed it, I wish the format was a little more simple.
author: George J Sellar

review: The firestick will not stay connected to the Internet.  I use the first one at a different location and need this to work at my current location, but they are connected together. Any kind of assistance to make it work better is greatly appreciated.
author: Edna West
